alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms in Lapeer, northern Oakland and eastern Genesee Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 535 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Columbiaville to near Goodrich to near Holly. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ortonville around 550 PM EDT. Lapeer and Hadley around 600 PM EDT. Oxford, Metamora and Lum around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Atlas, Goodland Township, Lakeville, Attica, Elba, Holly State Recreation Area, Leonard, Lake Orion, Kings Mill and Thornville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding.
